text: Moulins-sur-Tardoire is a commune in the department of Charente, southwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Vilhonneur (the seat) and Rancogne.Arrêté préfectoral 6 December 2018 == See also == *Communes of the Charente department == References == Category:Communes of Charente Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Moulins-sur-Tardoire
